suite.name: Test Suite Registration Functionality

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

test.name: TC 007

kw.name: Validate the Registering an Account by entering different password in 'Password' fields.
Click on 'Register' link
kw.doc: User can click on Registration link which is located on header part of home page After clicking on Registration page will open.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Firstname
kw.doc: Entering First Name as Elon

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Lastname
kw.doc: Entering Lastname as Musk

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Email
kw.doc: Entering Email Address as elonmusk@gmail.com

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Password
kw.doc: Entering passwords as elon@123

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Confirm Password
kw.doc: Entering confirm password as elon@123

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Display Warning Message for both Passwords not matched
kw.doc: Varify when user entering password and confirm password field is not same and Error message 'The password and confirmation password do not match.' should displayed.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.arg: The password and confirmation password do not match.
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: The password and confirmation password do not match displayed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

test.doc: Validate the Registering an Account by entering different password in 'Password' fields. password= elon@123 and confirm password= elon@abc both password are different so testcase should fail

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: This is Test suite file to execute test cases for Registration Functionality
